customer_reviews.title: BEST face wash for ALL skin types
customer_reviews.text: Switched to CeraVe from Cetaphil about 2 years ago after recommendations from my esthetician and close friend, from her dermatologist. Best choice I made and I'm still a Cetaphil fan. But only when I can't get to my CeraVe. This foaming cleanser is great in removing oil and MAKEUP, it contains the ingredients needed for youthful, healthy skin (hyaluronic acid, ceramides and niacinamide), and it doesn't exacerbate acne. Also switched my pre-teen from Neutrogena's oil-free acne wash to this and it has GREATLY improved her early years acne. If I can get her to use the AM lotion, then I'd truly be #winning

customer_reviews.title: FEELS GREAT GOING ON BUT CAUSES THOSE AWFUL BUMPS!
customer_reviews.text: If your skin tends to develop those awful white, under the skin, bumps / pustules with most washes and lotions, you know how frustrating the search for a non-irritating wash and lotion can be. I strayed from Alpha Hydrox (wash) and Oil of Olay (lotion) to try Cerave products and (unfortunately) have had terrible luck with them. My skin had some very large bumps within 6 hours and it has taken a week for them to finally go away. I know the reviews for both CeraVe products were so great...I was hoping both would work for me.

customer_reviews.title: CeraVe rocks
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely one of the best product lines around, and the foaming facial cleanser is not without exception. I used only CeraVe products, and I use this cleanser with my Clarisonic to remove my makeup at night. I use the hydrating cleanser in the morning. My skin is happy! The product isn't drying at all, and doesn't foam so much to be annoying and messy over my pedestal sink. It does a superior job at removing eye makeup (even without using the Clarisonic), and definitely leaves my skin feeling both soft and clean at the end of the day. It is gentle as well!

product_meta.title: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 12 Fl. Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free
product_meta.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser has a unique formula with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) that cleanses and removes oil without disrupting the protective skin barrier. Gentle foaming action refreshes and cleanses skin, including removing excess oils and makeup.

 * Non-comedogenic
 * Non-drying
 * Non-irritating
 * Ideal for normal to oily skin



Key Ingredients:

 * Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
 * Hyaluronic acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
 * Niacinamide: Helps repair a compromised skin barrier while improving the appearance of the skin
